Subject: EPP- AD Sync Issues
Description: Opening this ticket on behalf of Deloitte US. They had to make some changes in their AD which led to the Common Name of every user to be changed. In EPP, although the AD Sync seems to work fine, they have approximately 2000 users that are no longer associated with any groups, hence they are not getting any policies enforced.
Solution_Comment__c:
The Group that the customers had to sync was not added to the OU which was synced from the AD.
After the group was included in the OU the entities were imported on the EPP UI.
